data.name: McPixel 3
data.detailed_description:
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? It's falling too fast to be either of those. It's McPixel! A wanna-be hero who keeps getting mixed up in the most unbelievable situations you can imagine.

Avert one disaster after another at every turn using unconventional yet entertaining methods of mayhem including - but not limited to - summoning a spider-billionaire, having a BBQ in his pants, punching a T-Rex into outer space, peeing into sports cars, and kicking Fork Parker in the balls.

Key Features:

  • 100 mind-blowing levels
  • Over 900 hilarious gags
  • Nearly 1500 interactive items
  • Over 20 minigames in all imaginable genres
  • 258,924,600 pixels
  • Works on your mom's computer
  • Steve
  • A water level

data.short_description: McPixel 3 is a mind-blowing save-the-day adventure that sees the titular wanna-be hero avert one disaster after another at every turn using unconventional yet entertaining methods of mayhem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.8GHz / AMD Athlon 2600+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: C'97 compatible stereo sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6600 / Athlon X2 4600+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio compatible stereo sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X3100
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Core i5 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 x64 / Debian 10 x64
  • Processor: Pentium D / AMD Athlon 64
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible Stereo sound card
  • Additional Notes: requires libsdl2
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 x64 / Debian 11 x64
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo / Athlon X2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible Stereo sound card
  • Additional Notes: requires libsdl2
